version_description:
- Fix for MFi game controller button mapping
- Everyplay video sharing update
- New ways to earn free save tokens

- Updated icon
- Snow removed
- World 6 Leaderboard
- Bugfixes to some daily unlocks and outfits

>>> THE HUGE 'ANIMAL' UPDATE IS HERE!! <<<

- New crazy characters: Froggy, Moggy, Piggy, Dino and heaps more!
- Brand new world: World 7
- Brand new levels (now 255)
- MFi controller support
- Optimised for iOS9

- Snow for December
- Santa hats for characters
- Better rescue position after using save token
- Physics bug fixes (World 2-26, 2-27, etc)
- Holiday icon
- Game engine update: improved performance and stability
- Game engine update: improved performance and stability
